thread.title: The difference between liberal and conservative parenting in one cute video
thread.title_full: The difference between liberal and conservative parenting in one cute video

author: Bristol Palin
title: The difference between liberal and conservative parenting in one cute video
text:
I’m laughing at this because I’m imagining how this scene would play out had it happened in a liberal household. 
A child comes up to a stuff animal with a bat and hits it. A liberal parent might be worried their kid has pent up hostility, might advise the child about PETA’s policies on animal cruelty, or might call the therapist they keep on speed dial. 
But Dakota? Not so much: A post shared by Dakota Meyer (@dakotameyer0317) on Feb 22, 2017 at 7:05pm PST Buy our books!
